title: # 497 - Kamalei Alexander & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with pro surfer Kamalei Alexander. We talk about surf culture, why you shouldn’t buy land in Hawaii, Kelly Slater, Mark Zuckerberg vs Hawaii, Kamalei’s shop, and much more! 

 

Follow Kamalei here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kamaleialexander/?hl=en
